xml.Query_GetTop100LoanLevelData: SELECT top 100 * FROM LoanLevel WHERE is_active = 1 and process_stop_code = '0' and bad_check_stop_code = '0' and foreclosure_stop_code='0' and pif_stop_code='0' and delinquent_payment_count = 0 and drafting_indicator = 'N' and client_number = 'P2KL' and IsDeleted=0 and consumer_indicator_code is null and zone = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_HelocDelinquentPlusLoanData: SELECT delinquent_status, consumer_indicator_code, next_payment_due_date, * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] ll WHERE zone = 'ZONECODE' and first_principal_balance GREATER_THEN 0 and consumer_indicator_code is not NULL and next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) - 2, 0) and (select COUNT(*) from MelloServETL.dbo.PaymentSetup where PaymentStatus='Processed'and LoanNumber=ll.loan_number)=0
xml.Query_DelinquentPlusLoanData: SELECT * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] ll WHERE zone = 'ZONECODE' and delinquent_payment_count GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO 3 and repay_plan_status_code is null and process_stop_code = '0' and pif_stop_code = '0' and foreclosure_stop_code = '0' and bad_check_stop_code = '0' and is_active = '1' and suspense_balance = '0' and consumer_indicator_code is null and (select COUNT(*) from MelloServETL.dbo.PaymentSetup where PaymentStatus='Processed'and LoanNumber=ll.loan_number)=0
